item.title: Motisons Jewellers Surges 17.53%: Key Technical and Financial Shifts Drive Volatility
item.description: Motisons Jewellers Ltd delivered a strong weekly performance, surging 17.53% from ₹11.52 to ₹13.54 between 2 and 6 February 2026, significantly outperforming the Sensex’s modest 1.51% gain over the same period.
